orig_text:
[RFC2234] Crocker, D. and P. Overell, "Augmented BNF for Syntax
             Specifications: ABNF", RFC 2234. November 1997.
correct_text:
[RFC2234] Crocker, D. and P. Overell, "Augmented BNF for Syntax
             Specifications: ABNF", RFC 2234, November 1997.
notes: The reference to RFC 2234 should have the "RFC 2234" series information followed by a comma (not a period).
